fact_check_explanation_title: Would an extension to Brexit cost £1 billion a month?
fact_check_explanation_summary: This only works if you’re comparing an extension to a no deal exit where the UK doesn’t pay the divorce bill.

fact_check_explanation_title: A new Brexit bill doesn’t allow the EU to unilaterally extend the Brexit date
fact_check_explanation_summary: Parliament has the power to reject an extension date suggested by the EU.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is £14 billion being spent on education?
fact_check_explanation_summary: By 2022/23 the government aims to spend £4.3 billion more on education, once you account for inflation, than in 2019/20.

fact_check_explanation_title: This image was edited to make it appear that Remain supporters burnt a Union Flag
fact_check_explanation_summary: The photo was edited to include a burning flag.

fact_check_explanation_title: Some images of Union Flags burning have been edited
fact_check_explanation_summary: One photo from a recent protest has been edited to falsely show a Union Flag flag burning.

fact_check_explanation_title: This picture of Remain supporters burning a Union Flag is fake
fact_check_explanation_summary: The photo was edited to include a burning flag.

fact_check_explanation_title: Life expectancy in the UK isn’t falling
fact_check_explanation_summary: UK life expectancies have been growing for more than a century, but growth has slowed down considerably in recent years.

fact_check_explanation_title: Muslim knife attacker claim is unfounded and implausible
fact_check_explanation_summary: A claim that 11,000 of 13,000 knife attacks in London were carried out by Muslim immigrants is unfounded and implausible.

fact_check_explanation_title: Not all of these claims about what MPs can claim in expenses are correct
fact_check_explanation_summary: The claims about what Iain Duncan Smith can claim in expenses as an MP are not all true.

fact_check_explanation_title: There’s no evidence that any current vaccines cause cancer
fact_check_explanation_summary: Vaccines go through a number of trial stages to check they don’t have dangerous side effects.

fact_check_explanation_title: Claim that 97% of Labour activists support remain alliance is flawed
fact_check_explanation_summary: The claim that 97% of Labour activists want a “Remain alliance” comes from a survey of a pro-remain campaign group. It is not representative of all Labour activists.

fact_check_explanation_title: This post about the decision to increase the state pension age needs some context
fact_check_explanation_summary: Its figures on the pension of the former-permanent secretary to the DWP are correct, his role in the decision making process is less clear cut.
